name: Seena VR (Beta)
description:
Seena VR is a multiplayer CO-op survival shooter in VR, Experience the Real Live VR experience in a Battle against large waves of terrorists, defend your territory, and Raise your national patriotism.
Realistic Shooting mechanics and artificial locomotion will push your combat survival skills to their limit as you fight enemy lines across a large variety of maps and combat situations.

Features:

  • Dedicated Servers.
  • Co-op Survival Shooting game.
  • Weapon Simulation.
  • Matchmaking.
  • Touch-pad locomotion.
  • Different maps with different objectives (Soon).
  • Offline/Practice mode (Soon).
  • Voice Chat (Soon).
